response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a unique value, tailored specifically to meet your needs and enhance your experience. I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. This is an opportunity to own a piece that not only meets but surpasses your requirements, all while securing a significant value compared to its market worth. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you further. Let's make this a win-win proposition.", "product_price": 750000}
